# Vitou Neon Store — Full Web (Static)
- Upload the **dist/** folder to Vercel (New Project → Upload) or Netlify.
- Home: `/index.html`
- Admin: `/admin/login.html` (user: `admin`, pass: `12345`)
- Data stored in `localStorage` (key: `neon_products_v1`).
- Replace Telegram username inside `dist/js/store.js` if needed.
